mapper.insert: insert into review( GOODS_NUM, purchase_num, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENT, member_id) values( #{goodsNum}, #{purchaseNum}, sysdate, #{reviewContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select g.GOODS_NUM goodsNum, GOODS_NAME , GOODS_MAIN, REVIEW_NUM, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENT, PURCHASE_NUM from goods g, review r where g.goods_num = r.goods_num and REVIEW_NUM = #{reviewNum}
select PURCHASE_NUM purchaseNum, REVIEW_DATE reviewDate, REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent, MEMBER_ID memberId from review where GOODS_NUM = #{goodsNum}
select REVIEW_NUM reviewNum, REVIEW_DATE reviewDate, REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent, PURCHASE_NUM purchaseNum from review where REVIEW_NUM = #{reviewNum}
